shortdesc.ph: Stops or resumes subscribing to the audio stream of a specified remote user.
Stops or resumes subscribing to the specified remote user's audio stream.
Stops or resumes subscribing to the audio stream of a specified remote user.
Stops or resumes subscribing to the specified remote user's audio stream.

p.codeblock: abstract muteRemoteAudioStream(uid: number, mute: boolean): number;
abstract muteRemoteAudioStream(uid: number, mute: boolean): number;
Future<void> muteRemoteAudioStream({required int uid, required bool mute});
public abstract int MuteRemoteAudioStream(uint uid, bool mute);

section.title: Timing
section.p: This method must be called after joining a channel.
This method must be called after joining a channel.
You need to call this method after joining a channel.
This method must be called after joining the channel.

section.title: Related Callbacks
section.p: After this method is successfully called, the callback is triggered locally.
After this method is successfully called, the local user triggers the callback.
After this method is successfully called, the local user receives the callback.
After this method is successfully called, the local user triggers the callback.

plentry.pd: The user ID of the specified remote user.

Whether to stop subscribing to the audio stream of the specified remote user.
: Stop subscribing to the specified user's audio stream.
: (Default) Subscribe to the specified user's audio stream.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and troubleshooting.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
